inclusion.criterion: post aneurysm clipping having symptomatic vasospasm
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: new onset of focal neurological impairment such as hemiparesis, aphasia, apraxia, hemianopia, or neglect

inclusion.criterion: transcranial doppler confirmation of vasospasm by measuring cerebral blood flow velocity in MCA and LINDEGAARD ratio
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: cerebral angiographic confirmation of the presence of vasospasm by Digital subtraction angiography
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: new onset of focal neurological deficit or deterioration in the level of consciousness due to other causes like re-bleeding, hydrocephalus, cerebral edema, electrolyte disorder, infection and seizure
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients having an infarct on cerebral tomography
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: patient reports occasional dizziness, no prior syncope, denies CP/SOB, no sensory or motor defects
